connector.description: Allows receiving messages from any endpoint that supports the MQTT protocol, such as a message broker.

camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.topic.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.topic
camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.topic.description: The topic to subscribe to Example: mytopic

camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.brokerUrl.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.brokerUrl
camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.brokerUrl.description: The URL of the broker where to establish the connection Example: tcp://mosquitto:1883

camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.clientId.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.clientId
camel.kamelet.mqtt-source.clientId.description: The client ID to use when connecting to the resource
